cosmos.question: What am I? I am big and yellow and shine in the day. I help flowers grow!

hints.text: I am in the sky.
I am very hot.
I help you see during the day.

cosmos.question: What am I? I am round and white and come out at night. Sometimes I am full, sometimes just a little sliver!

hints.text: I am in the sky.
I reflect light from the sun.
Wolves like to howl at me.

cosmos.question: What am I? I am a bright dot in the night sky. There are many of me, far, far away!

hints.text: I twinkle.
I am not as big as the sun from Earth.
You make a wish upon me.

cosmos.question: What am I? I am where you live! I have land, water, and air!

hints.text: Animals and people live on me.
I am round like a ball.
I am also known as Earth.

cosmos.question: What am I? I am hot and red, and close to the Sun. People call me the Red Planet!

hints.text: I am a planet.
I am smaller than Earth.
My name sounds like a candy bar.

cosmos.question: What am I? I go around and around the Earth. I help with communication and navigation!

hints.text: I am in space.
I'm a machine.
I help people communicate and take pictures of the Earth.

cosmos.question: What am I? I am a group of stars that form a recognizable pattern in the sky.

hints.text: You need a clear night to see me.
Some of us have names like 'Big Dipper'.
I am a pattern of stars.

cosmos.question: What am I? I am a giant ball of gas with rings. I'm far away!

hints.text: I have rings!
I am made of gas and ice.
I'm named after a Roman god.

cosmos.question: What am I? I am a huge group of stars, gas, and dust, held together by gravity.

hints.text: There are billions of me in the Universe.
Our solar system is inside me.
My name starts with 'G'.

cosmos.question: What am I? I zoom through space with a bright tail when I get close to the Sun!

hints.text: I am made of ice, dust, and gas.
I orbit the sun.
I am often called a 'dirty snowball'.

transport.question: What am I? I go beep beep, and have wheels to go on the street!

hints.text: You see me on the road.
I can be red, blue, or any color!
Mommy and Daddy drive me.

transport.question: What am I? I float on the water, toot toot! People ride on me.

hints.text: I am bigger than a duck.
I can take you to an island.
I travel on the sea.

transport.question: What am I? I go choo choo and travel on a track!

hints.text: I carry many people at once.
I have lots of carriages.
I make a loud noise as I move.

transport.question: What am I? I fly in the sky and take people far away!

hints.text: I have big wings.
You can see me at the airport.
I soar through the clouds.

transport.question: What am I? You ride me with your feet and I have two wheels!

hints.text: You wear a helmet when you ride me.
You push with your feet to make me go.
I help you exercise.

transport.question: What am I? I am big and yellow and take lots of kids to school!

hints.text: I stop at bus stops.
I have flashing lights.
I am driven by a driver.

transport.question: What am I? I zoom in the sky and have a spinning top!

hints.text: I can hover in one place.
I have a loud whirring sound.
I can land almost anywhere.

transport.question: What am I? I help farmers work in the fields.

hints.text: I am big and strong.
I have big wheels.
I pull things.

transport.question: What am I? I'm fast and red and help put out fires!

hints.text: I have a siren.
I have a long hose.
I carry firefighters.

transport.question: What am I? I carry things and I have a big container at the back.

hints.text: I have many wheels.
I transport goods over long distances.
You see me on the highway.

plant.question: What am I? I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me.

hints.text: I am outside.
Animals eat me.
I am short and green.

plant.question: What am I? I am red, round, and grow on a plant. You can eat me.

hints.text: I am a fruit or vegetable.
Birds and people eat me.
I grow on a plant with green leaves.

plant.question: What am I? I am tall and brown, and I have green leaves. Birds like to build their homes in me.

hints.text: I am very big.
I stand very straight
I grow upwards to the sky.

plant.question: What am I? I am colorful and smell nice. Bees like to visit me.

hints.text: I grow in a garden.
I'm pretty to look at.
I can be pink, red or yellow.

plant.question: What am I? I am green and flat, and grow on trees. I fall down in the Autumn.

hints.text: I'm part of a tree.
I am not a branch.
I can change colors in the fall.

plant.question: What am I? I am long and orange, and you can eat me as a snack. Bunnies love me!

hints.text: I grow in the ground.
I am a vegetable.
I am crunchy.

plant.question: What am I? I am hard and brown, and I help the tree stand up tall.

hints.text: I am a part of a tree.
I am not the leaves.
I am the main part of the tree.

plant.question: What am I? I am a hard shell that holds a baby plant inside. You can plant me in the ground.

hints.text: I'm small.
From me, something can grow.
I can be from a flower, vegetable, fruit, or a tree.

plant.question: What am I? I am a prickly plant that lives in the desert. Ouch!

hints.text: I don't need much water.
I have spikes or needles.
I live where it's very hot and dry

plant.question: What am I? I'm a long, twisty plant that climbs up walls and trees.

hints.text: I'm green and flexible.
I need something to hold on to in order to grow.
I can be found in a jungle or garden.

food.question: What am I? I am yellow, and monkeys love to eat me. Peel me before you eat me!

hints.text: I grow on trees.
I am long and curved.
Monkeys say "Ooh ooh ah ah!" when they see me.

food.question: What am I? I am white and cold, and I taste yummy in a cone! You need a spoon to eat me!

hints.text: I melt when it's warm.
I come in lots of flavors, like chocolate and strawberry.
I make your tongue cold.

food.question: What am I? I am orange and crunchy, and bunnies love to eat me! I grow underground.

hints.text: I am a vegetable.
Bugs Bunny likes me a lot.
I help you see in the dark!

food.question: What am I? I am small and round, and I grow on a vine. You can eat me raw or make juice with me!

hints.text: I can be green or red.
I grow in bunches.
I don't need to be cooked before eating me.

food.question: What am I? I am long and brown, and you can mash me and put butter on me. I grow underground.

hints.text: I am a root vegetable.
You can make french fries from me.
I'm often eaten with meat or vegetables.

food.question: What am I? I am red and juicy, and grow on a plant. People like me on their burgers!

hints.text: I am a fruit, but people think I am a vegetable.
I am round and have a green stem.
I am good in salads and sandwiches.

food.question: What am I? I am yellow and cheesy, and I go great on pizza! I am made from milk.

hints.text: Mice like to eat me.
I can be hard or soft.
You grate me on to pasta and other dishes.

food.question: What am I? I am brown and sweet, and come from a tree. Squirrels love to bury me!

hints.text: I have a hard shell.
I can be roasted and eaten as a snack.
You need a nutcracker to open me.

food.question: What am I? I am small and green, and grow in a pod. I'm good in soups and salads.

hints.text: You can pop me out of my pod.
I am a legume.
I look like tiny balls.

food.question: What am I? I am made from flour, water, and yeast, and I am baked in an oven. You can put butter on me.

hints.text: I am often eaten with soup.
I can be sliced.
I come in many shapes and sizes.
